Ahoi all !


Long time, no hear ...


I've messed again with the Radiance-code and produced  a first (still 
unfinished) test  version of RADZILLA.


Beware, this is nothing for the faint hearted, as a lot of things are 
currently in progress, experimental, not
implemented yet, whatever. Despite this, this current test version is 
already quite useful especially for visualization projects..


So all you Indiana Jones's of raytracing: check out


http://www.cb-d.de/radzilla2.html


be prepared for everything and have FUN!


Carsten Bauer
